Title: Valid login
Steps(Step): Enter valid email, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Login successful, User is redirected to homepage

Title: Invalid email
Steps(Step): Enter invalid email, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Please enter a valid email" is displayed

Title: Empty email
Steps(Step): Enter empty email, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Email cannot be empty" is displayed

Title: Empty password
Steps(Step): Enter valid email, Enter empty password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Password cannot be empty" is displayed

Title: Password too short
Steps(Step): Enter valid email, Enter password less than 8 characters, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Password must be at least 8 characters" is displayed

Title: Forgot password
Steps(Step): Enter valid email, Click Forgot your password?
Steps(Expected Results): Password reset email is sent to user's email address

Title: Invalid password reset
Steps(Step): Enter invalid password reset link, Enter new password, Click Reset password
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Invalid password reset link" is displayed

Title: Create account
Steps(Step): Click Create account, Enter valid email, Enter valid password, Click Sign up
Steps(Expected Results): Account is created and user is redirected to homepage

Title: Duplicate email
Steps(Step): Click Create account, Enter existing email, Enter valid password, Click Sign up
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Email already exists" is displayed

Title: Compatibility - Chrome
Steps(Step): Open login page in Chrome browser, Enter valid email, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Login successful, User is redirected to homepage

Title: Compatibility - Firefox
Steps(Step): Open login page in Firefox browser, Enter valid email, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Login successful, User is redirected to homepage

Title: Compatibility - Edge
Steps(Step): Open login page in Edge browser, Enter valid email, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Login successful, User is redirected to homepage

Title: Usability - mobile view
Steps(Step): Open login page in mobile browser, Enter valid email, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Login successful, User is redirected to homepage

Title: Usability - keyboard navigation
Steps(Step): Open login page, Use keyboard to enter valid email, Use keyboard to enter valid password, Use keyboard to click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Login successful, User is redirected to homepage

Title: Usability - screen reader
Steps(Step): Open login page with screen reader, Enter valid email, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Screen reader announces successful login and user is redirected to homepage

Title: Negative - invalid characters in email
Steps(Step): Enter email with invalid characters, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Please enter a valid email" is displayed

Title: Negative - invalid characters in password
Steps(Step): Enter valid email, Enter password with invalid characters, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Password must contain only letters, numbers, or special characters" is displayed

Title: Negative - excessively long email
Steps(Step): Enter excessively long email, Enter valid password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Email cannot exceed 255 characters" is displayed

Title: Negative - excessively long password
Steps(Step): Enter valid email, Enter excessively long password, Click Sign in
Steps(Expected Results): Error message "Password cannot exceed 128 characters" is displayed
